name: helo-whatsapp
description: This app contains whatsapp platform for vivaconnect

scripts.develop-sendToWebhook-u: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=sendToWebhook MQ_OBJECT_KEY=webhookQueue USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
scripts.develop-sendToWebhook-h: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=sendToWebhook MQ_OBJECT_KEY=webhookHeloCampaign USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
scripts.develop-processQueueConsumer: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=processQueueConsumer MQ_OBJECT_KEY=process_message USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
scripts.develop-tyntecOutGoingQueueConsumer: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=tyntecOutGoingQueueConsumer MQ_OBJECT_KEY=tyntecOutgoing USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
scripts.develop-tyntecIncoming: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=tyntecIncoming MQ_OBJECT_KEY=tyntec_incoming USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
scripts.develop-tyntecMessageStatus: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=tyntecMessageStatus MQ_OBJECT_KEY=tyntec_message_status USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
scripts.develop-facebookOutGoingQueueConsumer: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=facebookOutGoingQueueConsumer MQ_OBJECT_KEY=fbOutgoing USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
scripts.develop-facebookIncoming: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=facebookIncoming MQ_OBJECT_KEY=fb_incoming USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
scripts.develop-facebookMessageStatus: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=facebookMessageStatus MQ_OBJECT_KEY=fb_message_status USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
scripts.develop-fetchAndUpdateTemplateStatus: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=fetchAndUpdateTemplateStatus MQ_OBJECT_KEY=tyntec_incoming USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
scripts.start-all-workers: npm run develop-processQueueConsumer & npm run develop-tyntecOutGoingQueueConsumer & npm run develop-tyntecIncoming & npm run develop-tyntecMessageStatus & npm run develop-facebookOutGoingQueueConsumer & npm run develop-facebookIncoming & npm run develop-facebookMessageStatus & npm run develop-retrySendingPayload
scripts.develop-audienceWebhook: NODE_ENV=development WORKER_TYPE=audienceWebhook MQ_OBJECT_KEY=audience_webhook USER_ID=Helo_test node server.js
